channel.title: Vote for cash
channel.description: Hi, I intergrated voting 4 cash in my server, its all good apart from the fact that players with spaces in their names cant vote, well they can but the mysql database doesnt recognise the space i think, i know it is the space because in my database the people that have voted and that dont have spaces receive their in-game reward. Does anyone know a fix or have a system that recognises spaces in names.

item.title: Vote for cash
item.dc:creator: @x_sam_x1 x sam x
item.description:
@x_sam_x1 wrote:

I fixed it was simple: URL url = new URL("http://www.sagi-x.com/vote.php?type=checkvote&username="+playerName.replace(" ", "%20"));
The address bar recognises a space as %20, quite a lucky guess really lol

Read full topic
